Aged 52 and married, she works hard to sufficiently provide for her family, and most especially for the education of her 6 children. She has never stopped pursuing her goals for the benefit of her family. 

She grabbed the opportunity to become a full-pledge member of PMPC. She gives credit to the Cooperative for the capital which has supported her rice farming activities. 

Recently she has applied for a loan to pay for labor costs for land and seedbed preparation on her rice farm. 

In the future, Carmelita wishes to buy agricultural land to cultivate in order to expand her farming activities.

loans.use: to pay for labor costs for land and seedbed preparation on her rice farm

loans.name: Sidzabda Group

texts.fr: Catherine, membre représentatif, est mariée et à 3 enfants dont 2 travaillent déjà et la dernière qui a 26 ans continue d'aller à l'école. Sidzabda est formé de 2 femmes battantes qui ont pris le prêt à ACFIME 15 fois et jusque là il n’ya pas de difficultés pour les remboursements. Catherine fait le commerce depuis 1990, elle a 3 employés qui l'aide à travailler moyennant rémunération mensuelle. Cette brave dame a besoin de ce prêt pour lui permettre d'acheter des pagnes pour vendre. Avec le bénéfice de ses ventes, elle va continuer son commerce et s'occuper de sa famille et prendre également soin des enfants de sa défunte sœur.
texts.en:
Catherine is the representative of the group.  She is married and has three children.  Two of her children are already working and the third, who is twenty-six years old, is still attending school.

The Sidzabda Group is made up of two tenacious women, who have already had fifteen loans with the field partner, ACFIME.  They have never had any problems repaying their loans.

Catherine has been a retailer since 1990.  She has three employees who help with her business and who are all paid on a monthly basis.  This formidable woman has requested this loan in order to buy pagnes (traditional, wrap-around clothing) for sale.  She plans to use her profits to continue her business, take care of her family and also take responsibility for the children of her sister who has passed away.

loans.use: to buy pagnes (traditional, wrap-around clothing) for resale.

loans.name: Atsupe

texts.fr: ATSUPE est divorcée et mère d’un enfant, puis est âgée de 33 ans ;elle fait la restauration du foufou avec des ignames depuis 2008 et s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché d’Assiyéyé, mais elle vit au quartier Adidogomé avec son enfant. ATSUPE désire un prêt pour soutenir son commerce qui lui permettra de mieux économiser pour s’occuper de son enfant et mieux se nourrir.
texts.en:
Atsupe is 33 years old, divorced and has one child.  She has been preparing and selling foufou (a yam based dough) since 2008.  Twice a month, she travels to the Assiyéyé market to buy her supplies.  She and her child live in the Adidogomé district.

Atsupe has requested this loan in order to strengthen her business, make financial savings, and take better care of her child and the food they eat.

loans.use: to buy 2 measures of yams for her food preparation business.

loans.name: Dopé Kanlé

texts.fr: Marié et âgée de 36 ans,DOPE est une mère de quatre enfants  vivant tous au quartier d’Adidogomé non loin du marché ;elle vend des poissons et s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au grand marché de Lomé ,puis les revend de maison en maison.DOPE sollicite un crédit pour augmenter son fréquence d’approvisionnement ;ce qui pourra l’aider à mieux  vendre afin d’épargner pour soutenir l’éducation de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Dopé is 36 years old, married and mother to four children.  They all live in the Adidogomé district, not far from the market.  She sells fish, and buys her supplies twice a month from the main market in Lomé.  She then sells the fish from door to door.

Dopé has requested this loan to increase the frequency with which she can restock.  This will enable her to save more money in preparation for supporting her children with their education.

loans.use: to buy 21 lots of fish for resale.

loans.name: Ayaovi

texts.fr: AYAOVI est mariée et mère de quatre enfants, puis est âgée de 27 ans ;elle fait le commerce des ignames depuis 2008 et s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché de Gbossimé, mais elle vit au quartier Adidogomé avec ses enfants. AYAOVI désire un prêt pour soutenir son commerce qui lui permettra de mieux économiser pour aider son mari dans les dépenses du foyer.
texts.en:
Ayaovi is 27 years old, married and mother to four children.  She has been selling yams since 2008, and buys her supplies twice a month from the Gbossimé market.  She lives with her family in the Adidogomé district.

Ayaovi would like this loan to strengthen her business, make savings and help her husband to provide for the expenses of their household.

loans.use: to buy 3 measures of yams for resale.

loans.name: Ami Keklenyuie

texts.fr: AMI est revendeuse des fruits au bord de la route la route ;elle est mariée et mère de deux enfants et vit au quartier d’Adidogomé,puis s’approvisionne par manque de moyen financier une fois par  mois,et est âgée de 30 ans.AMI demande un prêt pour augmenter son stock afin de satisfaire sa clientèle afin de tirer le maximum de bénéfices.
texts.en:
Ami sells fruit at the roadside.  She is 30 years old, married and mother to two children.  She lives in the Adidogomé district.

Due to lack of funds, she can only afford to buy more stocks once a month.  She has requested this loan to increase her stock levels, satisfy the demands of her customers and maximise her profits.

loans.use: to buy 2 sacks of oranges, a pile of pineapples and 2 baskets of bananas for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay school fees.

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es:
María Isabel tiene 52 años, es conviviente, vive en casa propia junto a su esposo, suegra e hijos en Cayaltí. De familia unida. Vive en una comunidad dedicada al comercio, agricultura y ganaderia. Ubicada en el distrito de Cayaltí, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

María Isabel se dedica a la crianza y comercio de cuyes y patos. Además, percibe ingresos por su esposo quien es docente en 02 instiutuciones educativas. El destino del crédito será para realizar mejoras en su vivienda. Pues con esto tendrá una mejora en la distribución en su vivienda lo que generará mejoras en lacalidad de vida.
texts.en:
María Isabel is 52 years old, married and lives together with her husband, mother-in-law and children in Cayaltí. She is from a close-knit family, and they live in a community in which trading, farming and animal husbandry are common. Cayaltí is a district located in the province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region, on the north coast of Perú. 

María Isabel makes a living raising and selling guinea pigs and ducks. She also receives an income from her husband who is a teacher in two educational institutions. The loan is destined to be used to make improvements to their home. This will result in an improvement in the layout of their home, which will improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to make improvements to her home.

loans.name: Twunguranubwenge Ii Group

texts.fr:
Félix était membre du groupe Twunguranubwenge II, mais il  en est chassé  du groupe avant le déboursement. Sur la photo, c’est la seule personne debout.
Josélyne est le chef du groupe .Elle  habite à Bujumbura. Elle a 32 ans et est mariée à Jean, un chauffeur. Ensemble ils ont 4 enfants âgés de 1 à 10 ans, dont  3 étudient. 

Elle fait le commerce d'habits depuis  9 ans. 

Elle est son deuxième   crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter beaucoup d' habits à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, elle voudrait  acheter une parcelle, et voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Josélyne, age 32, is the leader of Twunguranubwenge II Group. She lives in  Bujumbura and is married to Jean, a driver. They have four children together, aged 1 to 10. Three of them go to school.

Josélyne has been selling clothes for the past nine years. She's seeking her second loan from Kiva's partner, Turame. She will use it to increase her working capital and buy a large quantity of clothes to resell and earn more.

In the forthcoming years, she would like to buy a land lot and see her children study.

Félix was a member of the group, but he has been excluded before the loan was disbursed. In the picture, he's the only one who is standing.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of clothes to resell

loans.name: Niyonzima Group

texts.fr:
Jeanne fait partie du groupe  Niyonzima et  habite à  Bujumbura. Elle a 31 ans et est mariée à Audace, un cultivateur. Ensemble ils ont 2 enfants âgés de 4 à 6 ans, tous étudient.
 
Elle fait le commerce de  fruits  depuis  10 ans. 

Elle est à son deuxième   crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter  de beaucoup  bananes, avocats et oranges  à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, elle voudrait  acheter une parcelle, et voir se enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Jeanne is a member of Niyonzima Group who live in Bujumbura. She's 31 years old and married to Audace, a farmer. They have 2 children together, aged 4 and 6, who both go to school.

Jeanne has been selling fruits for the past 10 years. She's seeking her second loan from Kiva's partner, Turame. She will use it to increase her working capital and buy lots of bananas, avocados, and oranges to resell and earn more.

In the forthcoming years, she would like to buy a land lot and see her children study.

loans.use: buy lots of bananas, avocados, and oranges

loans.name: Akouvi

texts.fr: AKOUVI vend des produits d’alimentation générale depuis 2002 et s’approvisionne quatre fois par mois au grand marché de Lomé ;elle est mariée et mère de deux enfants,puis vit au quartier d’Adidogomé.Dans le souci d’améliorer sa vente,AKOUVI sollicite un crédit pour étendre sa marchandise afin de mieux économiser en faisant plus de bénéfices qui lui servira à épargner afin de s’épanouir et de mieux vivre.
texts.en:
Akouvi has been selling general foodstuffs since 2002.  She buys new stock four times a month from the main market in Lomé.

Akouvi is married and mother to two children.  They live in the Adidogomé district.

In the interests of improving her sales, Akouvi has requested this loan.  She will use it to extend her merchandise, make savings and improve her profits.  She will, therefore, be able to add to her savings and contribute to a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy 2 baskets of tomatoes for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to pay plowing costs, buy seeds, and rent another field

loans.name: Kanura Group

texts.fr:
Léonidas fait partie du groupe  Kanura et  habite à Bujumbura. Il a 31 ans et est marié Pauline, une cultivatrice. Ensemble ils ont 4 enfants âgés de 7 mois à 9 ans, dont  2 étudient.
Il a sous sa charge son beau-frère. 

Il fait le commerce de  boutique(riz, haricot, savons, ...)  depuis  9 ans. 

C’est son premier   crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il obtient, il va  augmenter son capital et acheter  une grande quantité de riz,  de haricot, et de savons à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, il voudrait  devenir un commerçant  grossiste des articles de boutique(riz,haricot,savons,...) et voir se enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Léonidas is a member of Kanura Group who lives in Bujumbura. He's 31 years old and married to Pauline, a farmer. They have four children together, aged 7 months to 9 years. Two of them go to school. He also has his brother-in-law in his care.

For the past nine years, Léonidas has been running a shop where he sells rice, beans, soaps, etc. This is his first loan with Kiva's partner, Turame. He will use it to increase his working capital and buy a large quantity of rice, beans, and soaps to resell, in order to earn more.

In the forthcoming years, he would like to become a wholesaler (rice, beans, soaps, etc) and see his children study.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of rice

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a modern dairy unit.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay school costs (his children's graduation)

loans.name: Amparito Shirley

texts.es:
Amparito es una mujer de 33 años de edad, casada, tiene 3 hijos de 15, 12 y 9 años, y su negocio es el servicio de peluquería.
Ella es buena madre, emprendedora, sincera, Inteligente, generosa, comprensiva, responsable y trabajadora. Su negocio lo realiza en la zona ‘plan 3000’ caracterizado por ser el barrio más poblado de la ciudad, y por el comercio de descendientes de inmigrantes de etnias del lugar como los ‘Ayoreos’ y mineros relocalizados de occidente, de clima cálido, tropical y húmedo con una temperatura constante de 30 grados centígrados durante todo el año.
Amparito es de tez trigueña, cabello castaño claro, baja estatura, su lengua materna es el guaraní y habla español para el comercio. Su vida la comparte con su esposo que se dedica al transporte y sus hijos que estudian en la escuela, viven en una casa propia construida de ladrillo que cuenta con agua potable, electricidad y alcantarillado. Su negocio es la peluquería actividad que viene realizando desde que era adolescente. Comenzó arreglando las uñas de sus clientes como manicure y pedicura,  poco a poco fue aprendiendo sobre la técnica y accedió a cursos de peluquería para profesionalizarse. Actualmente se encuentra brindando el servicio de masajes reductores; “la peluquería ha sido mi hobby desde que era niña, con el paso del tiempo me fui profesionalizando, actualmente tengo un salón muy concurrido y con clientes constantes…” comenta. Su sueño es ampliar su negocio y ser reconocida por el buen servicio, ella desea realizar la compra de materiales para masajes como, camillas, ceras, cremas y otros. Esta es la primera secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 2 años que viene realizando esta actividad de forma independiente.
Es por esos motivos que Amparito solicita un préstamo para la compra de camillas y material de trabajo para masajes reductores.
texts.en:
Amparito is 33 years old. She is married and has 3 children, aged 15, 12 and 9.  Her business is a hair salon. She is a good mother who is enterprising, sincere, intelligent, generous, understanding, responsible and hardworking.  She does her business in the ‘Plan 3000’ area, characterized as being the most populated neighborhood in the city and by the commerce from the descendants of immigrants of the local ethnic groups such as the ‘Ayoreos’ and miners who relocated from the west. It has a warm, tropical and humid climate with a stable temperature of 30 degrees celsius all year long.

Amparito has golden brown skin, light brown hair, and short stature. Her mother tongue is Guaraní and she speaks Spanish for business. She shares her life with her husband who works in transportation, and her children who are in school. They live in their own house. It is built of brick and has potable water, electricity and plumbing. Her business is hairstyling, which she has been doing since she was a teenager. She started by doing manicures and pedicures on her customers and little by little she learned techniques and went to hairstyling courses to become a professional. Right now, she is offering her customers reduction massages. “Hairstyling has been my hobby since I was a little girl. Over time I became professional. Right now I have a very popular salon with regular customers,” she says. Her dream is to expand her business and to become known in the business for her good service. She wants to buy materials for massages, such as beds, waxes, creams and more. This is her first loan cycle with the institution in the 2 years that she has been doing this work independently. 

That is why Amparito is asking for a loan to buy beds and work materials for reduction massages.

loans.use: to buy beds and work materials for reduction massages.

loans.name: Elida Mercedes

texts.es:
Elida es una joven que a su corta edad, 21 años, ya culminó con su carrera de Ingeniería Industrial y no duda en continuar aprendiendo. Todos los días ella sueña con seguir en sus estudios superiores, pues considera que de esa forma tendrá más oportunidades para seguir adelante y apoyar a sus padres como ellos la han apoyado.
Elida cuenta con el apoyo económico de sus padres, el papá es ingeniero eléctrico y su mamá tiene su propio negocio. Ahora que ya concluyó una etapa en su vida, quiere seguir con una nueva. Por esta razón es que solicita un préstamo para pagar una maestría, pues ese será el siguiente paso que le permitirá adquirir mayores conocimientos y podrá optar por una mejor oportunidad en el campo laboral. Su meta es culminar con su maestría y ayudar económicamente a sus padres.
texts.en:
Elida, 21, has already received her degree in Industrial Engineering, despite being that young. She is eager to continue learning. Every day, she dreams of being able to continue with her studies, since she feels that she would have more opportunities to get ahead in order to help her parents in the same way that they have helped her. Elida has the financial support of her parents. Her father is an electrical engineer and her mother runs her own business.

Elida has reached a milestone in her life, and wants to continue pursuing the next one. This is why she is requesting a loan to pay for her master studies. This will help her to acquire new knowledge, which will result in better job opportunities. Her goal is to receive her master’s degree and contribute to her parents’ economy.

loans.use: to pay for her master studies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy ceramic tiles.

loans.name: Benjamin Rafael

texts.es:
Benjamín es un joven de 27 años que poco a poco ha ido consiguiendo su licenciatura en Administración de empresas. Todos los sábados, este joven emprendedor alista sus libros para seguir con su carrera que pronto lo convertirá en un licenciado. Él ya está en 4to año de la carrera y no falta más que un paso para poder terminar con esta meta en su vida. Este joven emprendedor se siente motivado en contribuir con el desarrollo del país, por lo que no dudo en elegir esa carrera.
Afortunadamente Benjamín cuenta con el apoyo de su familia completa. Además trabaja como cajero y recepcionista de una empresa privada, donde práctica lo aprendido en su universidad. Ahora está solicitando un préstamo para pagar su curso de titulación, pues ese es último paso que lo llevará a cumplir con el sueño de obtener su título como administrador de empresas. Esto le permitirá tener mejores oportunidades laborales  y lo ubicará en el camino correcto para establecer el negocio propio con el que tanto sueña.
texts.en:
Benjamín is a 27 year old young man who little by little has been getting his bachelor degree in business administration. Every Saturday, this young entrepreneur gets his books ready to continue with his major, which he will graduate from soon.  He is already in his 4th year and there is only one step left to be able to finish this goal in his life. This young entrepreneur is motivated to contribute to his country's development, and that is why he didn't hesitate to choose this major. 

Fortunately, Benjamín has the support of his whole family. He also works as a cashier and receptionist at a private business, where he practices what the has learned at college. Right now, he is asking for a loan to pay for his graduation course. This is the last step to achieve his dream of getting his degree as a business administrator. This will allow him to have better work opportunities and will put him on the right road to open his own business that he has been dreaming about so much.

loans.use: to pay for a graduation course.

loans.name: Zeneyda

texts.es:
La señora Zeneyda, es comerciante en uno de los mercados de la Ciudad de León, desde hace once años, sale de su casa de habitación a las 05:00 am para iniciar sus labores 6:30 am finalizando sus labores a las 12:00 pm con este mismo horario de lunes a sábado, ella realiza esta labor para el sustento de su hogar.

La señora Zeneyda se acercó a Ceprodel a solicitar un crédito  para comprar cuajada, borona, queso duro y crema, cuya mercadería le ayudara a incrementar su capital de trabajo permitiendole mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Zeneyda has been a merchant on one of the markets in the city of León for eleven years. She leaves her home at 5:00 a.m. to start her work at 6:30 a.m. and finishes at 12:00 p.m. She has the same schedule Monday through Saturday and she does this work to support her home. 

Zeneyda approached Ceprodel to ask for a loan to buy curd, corn meal, hard cheese and cream. This merchandise will help her increase her working capital, allowing her to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy curd, corn meal, hard cheese and cream.

loans.name: Luz Aracely

texts.es: Luz de 62 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo ella posee una imprenta en su lugar de residencia desde hace 12 años y tiene muchos clientes por la calidad con que realiza su trabajo, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra papel y tintas de colores por mayor para continuar con su trabajo y asi tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Luz is 62 years old and lives in her own house with her husband. She has had a press in her home for the past 12 years and has many customers for the quality with which she does her work. She is asking for a loan to purchase paper and colored ink in bulk to continue with her work and, in turn, have more income.

loans.use: to purchase paper and colored ink in bulk.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: school fees (enrollment)

loans.name: Isela Margarita

texts.es: Isela de 32 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus dos hijas, ella posee un cibercafe ubicado en su lugar de residencia desde hace varios años, tiene muchos clientes especialmente los vecinos, ella esta solicitando un credito para la compra de resmas de papel, tinta para impresoras y darle mantenimiento a las computadoras y asi continuar con su trabajo ya que esa es su unica fuente de trabjo.
texts.en: Isela is 32 years old. She lives in her own house with her two daughters. She has owned a small internet cafe located in her residence for several years. She has a lot of customers, especially neighbors. She is asking for a loan to buy reams of paper and printer ink as well as to do maintenance on the computers. This way, she can continue with her work, since this is her only source of income.

loans.use: to buy reams of paper and printer ink as well as to do maintenance on the computers.

loans.name: Nidia

texts.es: La señora Nidia de 26 años de edad, vive al lado oeste de la ciudad está casada con el señor Antonio, tiene un grado de instrucción de nivel técnico es auxiliar contable y el esposo de nivel bachillerato, tienen dos hijos que dependen de sus ingresos, el ultimo recién nació hace 3 meses por esa razón Nidia dejo de trabajar para dedicarse a su hijo completamente, como sus ingresos no le alcanza, se dedicó a la venta de productos cosméticos y zapatos de revistas, así podrá estar al lado de sus hijos ya que esta actividad lo puede realizar desde su casa, su esposo se dedica al Servicio de Transporte de pasajeros con una antigüedad de 10 años de experiencia en el rubro, trabaja de lunes a sábado sin descanso. Ahora la señora solicita un crédito para la compra de muebles y enseres a su hijito recién nacido ya que no cuentan con ellos.
texts.en: Nidia is 26 years old. She lives on the west side of the city and is married to Antonio. She has a technical degree as an assistant accountant and her husband is a college graduate. They have two children that depend on them. The youngest was born three months ago and that is why Nidia stopped working to care for him full time. Since she doesn't have enough income, she started to sell cosmetics and shoes via catalog. This way, she can be with her children because she can do this activity from home. Her husband works in passenger transportation and has 10 years' experience in that area. He works Monday through Saturday without rest. Now she is asking for a loan to buy furniture and items for her son because she needs them.

loans.use: to buy furniture and items for her newborn son, because she needs them.

loans.name: Reyna Isabel

texts.es: Reyna de 42 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo ella se dedica desde hace 2 años a la crianza de pollos comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de pollos por mayor para continuar con la crianza ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo.
texts.en: Reyna is 42 years old and lives in her own house with her husband. She has worked for 2 years raising chickens; she sells her products in the different markets that are near her house. She is asking for a loan to purchase chickens in bulk to continue with raising them, since it is her only source of work.

loans.use: to purchase chickens in bulk.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a car to work in taxi service and have independent work with the end of being able to spend more of her time with her children who are still young.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es: La señora Gloria vive  en la ciudad de Santa Cruz, con su esposo el Sr. German casados hace mas de 30 años.  La señora es una persona emprendedora y muy trabajadora, ella a muy temprana edad tuvo que trabajar para ganarse el pan del día, en sus inicios trabajaba como empleada domestica, después se dedico a la venta de abarrotes,  pero ya son mas de 10 años que se dedica a la venta de comida, gracias a su esfuerzo y trabajo duro junto a su pareja lograron comprar su casa propia, ambos  tienen 4 hijos pero son mayores y todos trabajan. Como su negocio se encuentra en crecimiento necesita un credito para comprar insumos para elaborar sus comidas y de esa manera poder cumplir con la demanda que tiene y así generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en: Gloria lives in the city of Santa Cruz with her huband German; they have been married for over 30 years. She is an enterprising person and very hard-working.  At a very young age, she had to work to earn her daily bread. At the beginning, she worked as a domestic worker, later she sold groceries, but for over 10 years now, she has worked selling food. Thanks to her efforts and hard work alongside her partner, they have managed to purchase their own house.  They have 4 children but they are now adults and all of them work.  As her business is growing, she needs a loan to purchase supplies to make her meals and in this way to be able to meet the demand she has, and in turn generate more income for her family.

loans.use: to purchase supplies to make her meals and to be able to meet the demand she has and in this way generate more income for her family.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: La señora Juana vive en la población de Entre Ríos del trópico de Cochabamba junto a su concubino y sus 4 hijos a los cuales cuidan y apoyan en sus estudios. La señora trabaja dedicándose al área agrícola tiene su terreno agrícola propio, donde cultiva piña junto con la ayuda de su marido, de esta actividad obtiene buenos ingresos por año, trabaja día a día buscando el bienestar de sus hijos para que ellos estudien y ya no sufran como sus padres. La piña lo comercializa en el mismo lugar donde se cosecha la fruta, ahora requiere un crédito para aumentar su producción y a la vez brindarle un buen mantenimiento a su cultivo, de esta forma mejorara sus ingresos y su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Juana lives in the town of Entre Ríos in the tropics of Cochabamba together with her spouse and 4 children, who they support in their studies. She works in agriculture and has her own plot of land where she grows pineapples with the help of her husband. From this job she obtains a good yearly income. She works every day in order to ensure the wellbeing of her children and so that they are able to go to school and do not suffer like their parents. The pineapple is sold in the same place where the fruit is harvested. She now needs a loan to increase her production and at the same time maintain her crops and therefore improve her income and quality of life.

loans.use: to increase her production and at the same time maintain her crops and therefore improve her income and quality of life.

loans.name: Vehasi Group

texts.fr:
Etienne fait partie du groupe  Vehasi  et  habite à Bujumbura. Il a 40 ans et est marié à Annociate, une cultivatrice. Ensemble ils ont 1 enfant de 1 année 6 mois.

Il fait le commerce de  boutique depuis 23 ans. 

Il est à son troisième   crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il obtient, il va  augmenter son capital et acheter  beaucoup d’habits  à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, il voudrait  construire une maison  et voir son enfant étudier.
texts.en: Etienne is a member of the Vehasi group and lives in Bujumbura. He is 40 years old and married to Annociate, who works in agriculture. Together, they have one child who is 18 months old. He has been overseeing a clothing boutique for 23 years. He is asking for a loan from Turame, in order to increase his working assets and purchase many clothes to resell and earn more profit. In the coming years, he hopes to build a home and see his child attend school.

loans.use: increase his working assets and purchase many clothes to resell to earn more profit

loans.name: Brayan Alexander

texts.es: Brayan es un joven soltero, se dedica a la crianza de ganado, y comenta que son sus padres quienes  le enseñan que el negocio de la ganadería es muy rentable, el crédito lo va  a invertir en la compra de toretes que los va a tener en un terreno por el que paga arriendo de la hierba, la meta que se  tiene propuesto Brayan es  mejora su negocio seguir trabajando y a futuro comprarse un terreno para tener sus toretes en un lugar propio.
texts.en: Brayan is single. He earns his living raising cattle, a profitable job that he learned from his parents. He plans to use the loan money to buy young bulls which he will keep on a plot of land that he leases. Brayan’s goals are to improve his business, continue working, and in the future buy land so that he has a place of his own where he can raise cattle.

loans.use: buy young bulls

loans.name: Thelma

texts.en:
Thelma is 56 years old and a widow. 

She has engaged in a coco farming business for 10 years and earns a maximum of 6,500 PHP every harvest. 

She has been a member in Paglaum since 2011 and continues to be active in its activities.

Thelma is requesting a 12,000 PHP loan to purchase fertilizer. In the future, she hopes to expand and improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and pesticides.

location.town: Calamba-Sapang Ama Sapang Dalaga Misamis Occidenta

loans.name: Maria Victoria

texts.es: Maria vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos, ella posee una pequeña tienda desde hace varios años ubicada en su lugar de residencia vende una variedad de productos como golosinas, refrescos, granos básicos, café, sopas, huevos, gelatinas, azúcar, etc. y tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas mercadería por mayor ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos y así podrá tener mejores ganancias para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María lives in her own house with her two children.  She has owned a small store in her home for several years.  She sells a variety of products, including snacks, beverages, basic grains, coffee, soup, eggs, gelatin, and sugar, and she has a lot of customers because of her good prices.

María's requesting a loan to buy more merchandise wholesale.  It's her only source of income, and that way she'll be able to earn more profits to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy snacks, beverages, basic grains, coffee, soup, eggs, gelatin, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Amparo Marleny

texts.es: Amparo es una señora casada, tiene 4 hijos mismos de los cuales 2 de ellos están estudiando, ella  al igual que su esposo trabajan en la agricultura y a la ganadería, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de una vaca ya que comenta que es por medio del ordeño y la venta de la leche es  que consigue sus ingresos, la aspiración de esta medre responsable es de que le gustaría mejorar sus ingresos y por medio de este negocio mejorar la calidad de vida de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Amparo is married and has four children, two of whom attend school. She and her husband are farmers and also raise livestock. She plans to use the loan money to buy a cow as it is from the sale of milk that she earns a living. 

As a responsible mother, Amparo would like to increase her income and through her business improve her children’s standard of living.

loans.use: buy a cow

loans.name: Anecita

texts.en:
Anecita makes a good living with every quarter of her rice farm in Molave, Zamboanga del Sur, in the Philippines. This is her means of supporting her family. Anecita has been able to send all her children to school until they graduated and secured their own jobs. 

Out of the money she has saved, she purchased a 2-hectare riceland. Now, she wishes to plant rice seeds of a good variety so she can increase her farm's yield. However, she is in need of working capital. 

She presented her project to Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative and has requested a loan of 15,000 PHP in order to pay for land and seedbed preparation on her rice farm. Anecita has high hopes that her farm will have a good, high-quality yield.

loans.use: to pay for land and seedbed preparation on her rice farm.

loans.name: Wardy

texts.en:
In the year 2012, Wardy learned about Paglaum MPC and the financial assistance it gives start-ups. As a farmer in Liloan, Bonifacio, he tried his luck and borrowed a loan to jump-start his rice production. After several months, he was able to return his borrowed capital. To this day, Wardy feels he owes his good fortune to the cooperative for having trusted him with the money he used for his business. 

Recently, he availed a loan to purchase farm inputs and fertilizer for the next cropping season. Wardy wishes to sustain his business and be able to supply rice in the neighboring towns.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs and fertilizer.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is 42 years old. She is a widow with two children. They live in Tambulig, Zamboanga del Sur. 

To earn a living, Evelyn is managing her rice farm and she also has a hog-raising business. Evelyn has mastered doing this type of activity over ten years. She joined Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative in April of 2012. 

As a breadwinner, she is hardworking and has a strong determination to pursue her goals to sustain their needs, alleviating poverty. 

Evelyn requested a loan to purchase fertilizers to increase crop yields on her rice farm, and also to buy additional piglets, animal feeds and vitamins. This will greatly help Evelyn boost her income. 

Someday, she hopes to buy a parcel of rice land to expand her farm and venture into the rice retailing business. 

Evelyn is now supporting her two children in getting college degrees. Someday, she will be happy seeing them finish their studies and secure their own jobs.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers to increase crop yields on her rice farm, and also to buy additional piglets, animal feeds and vitamins.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is 47 years old and lives in Butuay, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married and has two adult children.
 
Jocelyn earns a living from processing, repacking and retailing native coffee and cocoa. She has been in this business for 10 years already. Jocelyn earns approximately PHP 3,000 each month doing this type of business activity. 

She has requested a loan to be used in purchasing three sacks of dried coffee beans and cocoa seeds for her existing business. Jocelyn has been a member of PMPC for three years. 

In the future, Jocelyn hopes to establish a new processing building for her native coffee and cocoa processing, repacking and retailing business.

loans.use: To purchase three sacks of dried coffee beans and cocoa seeds.

loans.name: Nida

texts.en:
Nida is 56 years old and lives in Poblacion, Panaon, Misamis Occidental. She is married and has two adult children.

Nida has been engaged in a dried-fish vending business for five years already. She earns approximately PHP 1,500 each month doing this type of business activity. The profit is so helpful in meeting some of the family's needs.  

She has requested a loan to be used in purchasing additional stocks about 45 kilos of a variety of dried fish for retail.
 
Nida has been a member of PMPC for 10 years. In the future, Nida hopes to establish a stall at the market to display her dried fish for retail.

loans.use: To purchase about 45 kilos of a variety of dried fish to sell.

loans.name: Mucungwe Iii Group

texts.fr:
Déogratias fait partie du groupe  Mucungwe III et  habite à  Bujumbura. Il a 31 ans et est marié à Espérance, une commerçante. Ensemble ils ont 5 enfants âgés de 1 à 21 ans, dont  2 étudient.

Il a une boutique (savons, piles, biscuits,…)  depuis  15 ans. 

C’est son premier   crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il obtient, il  va  augmenter son capital et acheter  beaucoup de savons, de piles, et de biscuits à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, il voudrait  acheter une parcelle, et voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en: Déogratias is a member of the Mucungwe III group and lives in Bujumbura. He is 31 years old and married to  Espérance, a shopkeeper. Together, they have 5 children aged 1 to 21 years old, including two students. He has a small shop from which he has been selling soap, batteries, cookies...for 15 years. This is his first loan from Turame. He is hoping to increase his working assets and purchase a large quantity of soaps, batteries and cookies to resell and therefore earn more. In the coming years, he hopes to purchase a plot of land and see his children become educated.

loans.use: increase his working capital and purchase a large quantity of soaps, batteries and cookies to resell for greater profit

loans.name: Cresencia

texts.en:
Cresencia is 61 years old and lives in Taraka, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is widowed and has four adult children.
 
Cresencia earns income from a broiler chicken raising and vending business. She has been engaged in this business for just a period of four months. She earns approximately PHP 1,000 each month doing this type of business activity, and that amount is so helpful to meet her needs. 

She has requested a loan to be used in purchasing three sacks of booster and grower feeds for her poultry business.
 
Cresencia has been a member of PMPC for two years. In the future, Cresencia hopes to establish her own feeds retailing business.

loans.use: To purchase three sacks of booster and grower feeds.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita is 42 years old, married and has two children, both in high school. She lives in Calamba-Landing, Baliangao, Misamis Occidental. Her husband is a farmer. 

They engage in a rice and cocoa farming business. She has been a member in Paglaum MPC for 11 years, and she is a good repayer. She strives hard to sustain their living. 

Lolita is requesting a 20,000 PHP loan to purchase fertilizer. In the future, she hopes to expand and improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of fertilizers and pesticides.

loans.name: Fedila

texts.en:
Fedila is 52 years old. She is a widow with three adult children. She lives in Calamba-Landing, Baliangao, Misamis Occidental. 

She has engaged in a rice farming business for nine years and earns 5,000 PHP every harvest. She has been a good member in Paglaum MPC for more than eight years and continues to be active in any coop activities. 

Fedila is requesting a 14,900 PHP loan to purchase fertilizer. In the future, she hopes to expand and improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of fertilizers and pesticides.

loans.name: Amalia

texts.en:
Amalia is 38 years old, married, and a resident of Ozamiz City. She earns a living through sari-sari (variety) store retailing.

She has been a member of PMPC for two years and enjoys the privileges of being a member of the cooperative. 

Now she is applying for a loan to buy bags of rice and canned goods to have available stock for her sari-sari store business.

Amalia deeply wishes to remain a member in good standing with PMPC.

loans.use: To buy bags of rice and canned goods for her sari-sari store business.

loans.name: Ruddy Felix

texts.es:
Ruddy es un hombre joven de 21 años de edad, soltero, sin hijos, y su negocio es el bordado artesanal de trajes tradicionales de baile folclórico.
Él es inteligente, activo, audaz, creativo, responsable y trabajador. Su negocio lo realiza en la zona ‘Los Andes’ un área caracterizada por agrupar a artesanos bordadores de todo tipo, que se dedica a la elaboración de trajes tradicionales de bailes folclóricos como; Caporales, Morenada, Suri Sicuris, Diablada, Tinku, etc. de clima frio y seco, con una temperatura ambiente entre 8-18 grados centígrados que varía durante el día.
Ruddy es de tez morena, cabello negro corto, baja estatura, su lengua materna es el Aymará que casi no utiliza y habla español para estudiar. Su vida la realiza en casa de sus padres que es propia y cuenta con agua potable, electricidad y alcantarillado. Su negocio es el bordado artesanal, negocio familiar que pertenece a sus padres y que viene realizando desde que era niño por las mañanas, durante el resto del día se ocupa de sus labores personales, actualmente estudia ingeniería eléctrica en la universidad y percibe un sueldo como bordador que le ayuda a pagar sus gastos estudiantiles. Su sueño es terminar su carrera en la universidad, y desea realizar la compra de una computadora portátil además de materiales de estudio como, libros, cuadernos, hojas, bolígrafos, etc. que necesita constantemente para estudiar. Esta es la primera secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 4 años que viene realizando esta actividad con salario fijo.
Es por esos motivos que Ruddy solicita un préstamo para la compra de una computadora portátil y material de estudio para terminar su carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
Ruddy is a 21 year old single young man with no children.  He does artistic embroidering on traditional folk dance outfits.

He is intelligent, active, audacious, creative, responsible and hardworking.  He runs his business in the Los Andes region, an area characterized by its groups of artists of all types, who make traditional folk dance costumes such as Caporales, Morenada, Suri Sicuris, Diablada, Tinku, etc.  The climate is dry and cold with average temperatures between 8 and 18 degrees Celsius that varies throughout the day.

Ruddy is dark skinned, with short black haired, short statured, and his native tongue is Aymará, which he rarely uses and he speaks Spanish in school.  He lives with his parents and they have running water, electricity, and sewage.  His embroidery business is a family run business that actually belongs to his parents, but he has been doing since he was a boy.  He works in the mornings and spends the rest of the day doing personal things.  He is studying electrical engineering at university and his embroiling salary helps him pay his schooling expenses.  His dream is to finish his education and wants to buy a portable computer and school supplies like books, notebooks, paper, biographies, etc. that he needs on a regular basis.  This will be his first loan through the institution and he has had a fixed salary for four years.

Ruddy is asking for a loan to buy a portable computer and school supplies.

loans.use: to buy a computer.

loans.name: Hadiyatou's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe créé le 22 janvier 2003 et le banc villageois vient  d’entamer son vingt deuxième cycle. Malgré les difficultés de la zone à maintenir une activité génératrice de revenues, ces membres sont d’une détermination assez solide et très courageux. Les membres sont solidaires entre eux et vivent dans le même village. L’activité principale est le petit commerce, accompagné de la culture sous pluie.

Madame Hadiyatou (assise à droite avec une main levée), est l’emprunteuse vedette du groupe. Elle est mariée, âgée de 32 ans et mère de 4 garçons de 01 à 14 ans. Elle tient une place au village pour la vente de petit déjeuner. Elle a une bonne expérience dans ce domaine pour l’avoir pratiqué pendant plus de 5 ans.

Avec son nouveau prêt, elle pense acheter un sac de sucre, du lait par carton du café par boîte et des paquets de spaghetti et divers ingrédients.

En plus de renforcer son épargne, les bénéfices seront utilisés à rendre la vie de famille plus facile.
texts.en:
This group, created on 22 janvier 2003, recently began their 22nd loan cycle with the village bank. Despite difficulties in the area to maintain economic activity, these members are very determined and quite brave. The members are supportive of each other and all live in the same village. Their principal moneymaking activity is the management of small businesses, accompanied by rain-fed crop cultivation.

Mrs Hadiyatou (seen sittin gon the right with her hand raise) is the group's star borrower. She is married, 32 years old, and the mother of four boys aged 1 to 14 years old. She has a spot in the village from which she sells breakfast. She has a good experience in this activity, having been involved in this for more than 5 years.

She is asking for a new loan in order to purchase a bag of sugar, cartons of milk, boxes of coffee, packs of spaghetti and diverse other food products. In addition to reinforcing her savings, profits will be spent on improving the lives of her family.

loans.use: purchase a bag of sugar, cartons of milk, boxes of coffee, packs of spaghetti and diverse food products

loans.name: Ivan Fernando

texts.es: Fernando es un señor de 28 años de edad, tiene una hija de 6 años que se encuentra asistiendo a la escuela, el es un padre muy responsable con su hija y siempre se hace cargo de los gastos diarios de ella, Fernando trabaja en la agricultura y en la ganadería, comenta que  con el dinero del crédito va a comprar terneros para criarlos y al momento de venderlos obtener una ganancia que le permita darle a su hija lo que necesite.
texts.en: Fernando is a 28 year old man who has a 6 year old daughter who goes to school. He is a very responsible father with his daughter and always takes care of the daily expenses for her. Fernando works in agriculture and raising livestock. He comments that he will use the money from the loan to buy calves to raise and make a profit on selling them which will allow him to provide his daughter with what she needs.

loans.use: to buy calves.

loans.name: Maria Rosa

texts.es: Rosa es una señora muy responsable, tiene 59 años de edad, esta casada y tiene 3 hijos, Rosa vive con su  esposo 3 hijos y 2 nietos que estudian, Rosa y su esposo se dedican  a trabajar en la agricultura, la ganadería y crianza de animales menores, ella agradece a quienes le apoyan en su crédito que lo va a invertir en la compra chanchos, la aspiración de Rosa es seguir con su negocio, pagar puntual sus cuotas y apoyar a sus hijos y nietos en las gastos diarios.
texts.en: Rosa is 59 years old and a responsible woman. She is married and has 3 children. Rosa lives with her husband, 3 children and 2 grandchildren who study. Rosa and her husband work in agriculture and raising livestock and small animals. She thanks those who support her with this loan which she will invest in buying pigs. Rosa's dream is to continue with her business, to pay off her loan on time and to support her children and grandchildren with their daily expenses..

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Jose

texts.es: Jose es soltero y vive con sus padres en La Paz en una casa de acabado fino Afortunadamente elcliente y su familia viven con comodidad Jose se gana la vida como musico de orquesta, pero es de esas orquestas que ofrecen sus servicios en fiestas, matrimonios y otros eventos de caracter social donde los musicos se exponen a consumir bebidas alcoholicas en exceso Por eso Jose quiere terminar sus estudios en Administración de empresas a toda costa, en la Universidad le ofrecieron un buen descuento si paga al contado cierto monto y es para eso que Jose quiere credito, para cancelar pagos en la universidad Además, Jose es la unica fuente de ingresos en el hogar, sus padres no tienen trabajo, lo bueno es que goza de buena salud y espera poder recibir su ayuda
texts.en:
Jose is single and lives with his parents in La Paz.  They live in a house with fine finishing touches.  Fortunately, he and his family live comfortably.  

Jose earns a living as an orchestra musician.  However, these orchestras offer their services at parties, weddings, and other social events where the musicians are exposed to excessive consumption of alcoholic beverages.  That is why Jose wants to finish his studies in Business Administration at all costs.

The university is offering a good discount for cash payment of a certain amount.  That is why Jose wants the loan in order to make payments to the university.  Also, Jose is the only source of income in his household.  His parents do not have work.  The good thing is that he enjoys good health, and he hopes to be able to receive your help.

loans.use: to make payments to the university.

loans.name: Maria Lourdes

texts.es: A sus 27 años Maria Lourdes ha logrado salir adelante en el negocio que poco a poco ha ido incrementando. Esta acompañada y tiene dos hijos que aún tiene a su cargo. Maria Lourdes hace cuatro años que se dedica a la venta de pollo, gaseosa y fresco. Hace ocho años que su papa se fue a los Estados Unidos y junto a su esposo lograron salir adelante luego su papa le regalo un freezer para que iniciara su propio negocio y poco a poco han ido ofreciendo una amplia variedad de productos. Solicita el crédito para la compra de pollo, gaseosa y jugos. El préstamo le será de mucha ayuda ya que los clientes tienen bastante demanda con los productos que ofrece. Dentro de su meta próxima es ser distribuidor mayorista de pollo.
texts.en:
At 27 years old Maria Lourdes has managed to get ahead with her business which little by little has been growing. She is in a relationship and has two children who she is responsible for. Four years ago Maria Lourdes started selling chicken, soft drinks and fruit drinks.

Eight years ago her father went to the United States and together with her husband they managed to get ahead as her father gave her a freezer so she could start her own business. Little by little they have been offering a greater variety of products.

She is requesting this loan to buy chicken, soft drinks and juices. The loan will be of great use as there is a lot of demand from clients for the products that they have. Her next goal is to become a wholesale distributor of chicken.

loans.use: to buy chicken, soft drinks and juice.

loans.name: Irene

texts.en:
Irene is 67 years old, widowed, and has six adult children. She lives in Lutao, Panaon, Misamis Occidental. Irene operates a sari-sari (general) store at the cockpit gallery on Sundays, which she has been doing for 15 years. She earns approximately 1,500 PHP each month. She also receives a monthly pension as a surviving spouse. 

Irene requested a loan from PMPC, which she will use to purchase additional stocks of groceries, soft drinks, and other consumable products to sell. In the future, Irene hopes to expand her sari-sari store.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of groceries, soft drinks, and other consumable products

loans.name: Marco

texts.es: Marco es soltero y no tiene hijos Marco vive con sus padres en La Paz en una casa de ladrillo y cemento Marco sigue dedicandose a la carpinteria y necesita un credito para seguir comprando de madera para fabricar muebles Marco es la unica fuente de ingresos en su hogar por lo que necesita su ayuda Afortunadamente Marco goza de buena salud lo que le permite trabajar con ahinco puesto que para el cliente mantener un hogar no es una tarea fácil
texts.en:
Marco is single, and he does not have children.  Marco lives with his parents in La Paz.  They live in a house made of brick and cement.  Marco continues working in carpentry, and he needs a loan to continue buying wood to make furniture.

Marco is the only source of income in his household, so they need his help.  Fortunately, Marco enjoys good health, which allows him to work energetically for his customers and to support his household.  It is not an easy task.

loans.use: to buy wood.

loans.name: Rosario

texts.es: Rosario es viuda y tiene tres hijos Ella vive en La Paz en una casa de ladrillo y cemento que es de su propiedad Rosario se dedica a la elaboración de diversas masitas y pasteles Rosario necesita credito para volver a comprar insumos (harina, azúcar, mantequilla, manteca) para su negocio de masitas, considerando que la epoca de navidad esta cerca, Rosario también quiere aprovechar para fabricar roscas de navidad que tienen demanda más que aceptable. Rosario es la unica fuente de ingresos en su hogar por lo que necesita su ayuda
texts.en: Rosario is a widow who has 3 children. She lives in La Paz in a house made of bricks and cement that is her property. Rosario works making a variety of cakes and pastries. Rosario needs a loan to buy more supplies (flour, sugar, margarine and butter) for her cake business considering that the Christmas season is close. Rosario also wants to take advantage of this to make Christmas cakes for which she has much demand. Rosario is the only source of income in her household so she needs your help.

loans.use: to buy supplies (flour, sugar, margarine and butter)

loans.name: Francisco Arturo

texts.es: Francisco de 36 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y su hijo, el se dedica a la crianza de ganado de engorde desde hace 7 años, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de  vitaminas y la compra de mas ganado que le permita crecer en el negocio y así tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Francisco, age 36, lives in his own house with his wife and his son.  He has been raising cattle for seven years.  He sells his products at the different markets.

He is requesting a loan to buy vitamins and to buy more livestock.  This will allow him to grow in the business, and he will have better earnings this way.

loans.use: to buy vitamins and to buy more livestock.

loans.name: Jodeline

texts.en:
Jodeline is 30  years old, married and has 2 children, both of whom are in elementary school. She lives in Misom, Baliangao Misamis Occidental. 

She has been in the rice farming business for 5 years and she earns 4,000 PHP per month. Jodeline is requesting a 3,000 PHP  loan to purchase fertilizer. 

In the future, she hopes to expand and improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and pesticides.

loans.name: Fita

texts.en:
Fita is 37 years old and lives in San Isidro, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married with three children who are now at school age.

Fita and her husband earn income from buying, cutting and selling lumber. The couple has been engaged in this business for 10 years already. She earns approximately PHP 7,000 each month from doing this type of business activity. That amount is so helpful to meet their family needs.

Fita has requested a loan to purchase construction materials for their house completion.

Fita has been a member of PMPC for eight years. In the future, she hopes to establish her own mini saw mill business.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials.

loans.name: Sorie Y.

texts.en:
Sorie Y. is a 28-year-old single man without  children.   

In 2010, Sorie Y. established his Mobile Phone Top up Cards business. He began his business by inspiration, while he was working with a mobile communication company.  He used his salary and commission to start his own business and works 7 days a week and 15 hours a day to earn about 750,000 SLL every month. 

He would like 5,000,000 SLL to buy mobile phones' top-up cards. A business challenge is collecting timely payment from customers. 

He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to pay for mobile phones' top-up cards.

loans.name: Emelia

texts.en:
Emelia is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Emelia is 50 years old and has one child in school.

Emelia has a buy and sell raw materials business in the Philippines. Emelia requested a 6,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional raw materials to sell. Emelia has been in this business for 1 year. 

In the future, Emelia would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional raw materials to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more bags of sugar, cartons of sardines, milk etc

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for a set of pans and a bucket.

loans.name: Gina Katherine

texts.es: Gina, es una joven emprendedora de 24 años,  inspirada por la idea de genera ingresos desde su casa, inicio en el año 2011 un negocio de comidas en el que ofrece carnes asadas, pechugas a la plancha, perros calientes, hamburguesas, entre otros, alterno a esta actividad tiene un video juego que inició luego de haber inagurado la venta de comidas.  Ella esta domiciliada en un barrio del municipio de Malambo y lleva en él más de tres años, vive con su cónyuge y es madre de un niño de 3 años de edad, a quien desea ofrecerle una mejor calidad de vida y una casa propia, por eso ella es muy comprometida con sus negocios y se dedica a ellos 14 horas diarias para obtener las ganancias esperadas.  Sus principales clientes son sus vecinos y transeúntes del sector, quienes disfrutan de las deliciosas comidas que prepara o se divierten con los videos juegos. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo mediante el cual comprará activos fijos para su negocio como sillas, mesas y un televisor. Gina tiene como meta a futuro mejorar la imagen de su local, con el propósito de hacer sentir al cliente más cómodo y que se convierta en uno de sus sitios favoritos para disfrutar de un rato de diversión y esparcimiento.
texts.en:
Gina, age 24, is an enterprising young woman.  Inspired by the idea of generating income from her house, she started a food business in the year 2011.  She sells roasted meat, grilled chicken breasts, hot dogs, hamburgers, and others.  She alternates this business activity with a video game business that she started after having opened her food business.

She has lived in a neighborhood in the Malambo municipality for over three years.  She lives with her husband, and she has a three year old son.  She wishes to give him a better quality of life and his own house.  That is why she is very committed to her businesses.  She devotes 14 hours a day to them in order to get the hoped for earnings.  Her main customers are her neighbors and passers-by in the area.  They enjoy the delicious food she makes or they have fun with the video games.

She is currently applying for a Kiva loan, her first loan with the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  She will use the loan to buy fixed assets for her business like chairs, tables, and a television.

Gina’s goal for the future is to improve the image of her place in order to make her customers more comfortable.  She also wants it to become one of their favorite places to enjoy a bit of fun and recreation.

loans.use: to buy chairs, tables, and a television.

loans.name: Faala

texts.en:
Faala is 23-year-old single woman. She makes and sells elei printing to earn a living and has been doing this for 3 years. Faala has requested a loan to buy paint, paint board, materials, and a paint brush. 

She plans to use her profits to support her family and to save for unexpected emergencies. She joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy paint,  a paint brush, a paint board,and  materials.

loans.name: Rosa Marlene

texts.es:
Rosa de 38 años de edad es casada y tiene 4 hijos todos viven con ella y estudian, estudio hasta 6° grado de educación básica, su esposo vive en el extranjero desde hace 4 años y le manda ayuda económica para los gastos de la familia. Solo sus hijos dependen de ella.

Rosa se dedica a la agricultura, aprendió de su padre a trabajar con granos básicos como maíz, frijol, arroz y otros. Antes solo se dedicaba a los oficios del hogar, pero desde que se fue su esposo decidió dedicarse por completo a la agricultura, actividad en la que se involucran sus dos hijos mayores trabajando 6 horas diarias.

Solicita el préstamo para comprar una vaca que le vende un familiar y quiere aprovechar no solo la oportunidad sino que también los residuos que le dejaran los cultivos para alimentarla, para que algún día produzca leche. Rosa sueña que sus hijos se gradúen de sus estudios universitarios y algún día reunirse con su esposo nuevamente.
texts.en:
Rosa is 38 years old, is married and has 4 children who live with her and are students. She studied until the 6th grade of primary school. Her husband has lived abroad for the last 4 years and he sends her money to help pay for the family expenses. Only her sons depend on her. 

Rosa makes a living working in farming. Her father taught her how to grow basic grains such as sweetcorn, beans, rice etc. Before this, her sole responsibility was looking after the house but since her husband left she decided to dedicate all her time to farming. Her two oldest sons also work with her for 6 hours per day. 

She is requesting the loan to buy a cow from a family member. She wants to make the most of this opportunity by also using the plant waste to feed the cow so that she will eventually produce milk. Rosa's dream is for her children to graduate from university and one day be reunited with her husband.

loans.use: to buy a cow from a family member.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase material.

loans.name: Confort M.

texts.en:
Comfort M. is a 30-year-old married woman with a  1 year old  child. 

In 2012, Comfort M. established her clothing business.  She works 7 days a week and 10 hours a day to  earn about 3,676,000 SLL every month. She would like a loan in the amount of 3,000,000 SLL. Comfort M. has previously received and successfully repaid 1 loan, and now requires a new loan to purchase shirts and jeans. 

In the future, Comfort M. plans to hope to acquire larger loans in order to improve the business and complete  her house.  She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase jeans and shirts.

loans.name: Celsa

texts.en:
Celsa is a widowed woman with 3 children who works hard to support her family.

She has a direct sales business and earns additional income operating a general store. Celsa requests 15,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase shampoo and lotions.

Celsa has sustained her business activities through 5 previous loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her to attain her dream which is to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase shampoo and lotions.

loans.name: Louie

texts.en: Louie is a 24-year-old resident of Pangatian, Cabanatuan City. He is taking up the Mechatronics course in Globaltech Institute for Advance Technology. He chose this because he knows that he can excel in this field. He wants to find a stable job and be successful to help his parents and siblings. To do this, he wants to seek financial assistance of 15,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) from the Kiva lenders, which he will utilize for his school fees.

loans.use: to pay for his tuition fee

loans.name: Delia

texts.en:
Delia is a married woman with 3 who works hard to support her family.

She has a hardware store business and earns additional income raising pigs. Delia requests 15,000 PHP through NWTF to buy items to sell for her hardware store business.

Delia has sustained her business through a previous loan from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her to attain her dream which is to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell in her business.

loans.name: Razela

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Razela works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from seaweed.  Razela is borrowing PHP 5000 through NWTF to buy fishing nets and other materials to use for her fishing business.  Razela has been sustaining her business activities through her past 1 loan from NWTF.  

She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets and other materials to use

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
As a married parent of nine children, Rebecca works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from general store. Rebecca is borrowing PHP 8000 through NWTF to buy fish nets and other materials for her fishing business.  She has been sustaining her business activities through her past 1 loan from NWTF. 

She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets and other materials for fishing

loans.name: Remedios

texts.en:
Remedios is 46 years old and married with four children.  She works hard to provide for her family. 

Remedios runs a general store in the Philippines.  She has been running the general store for 3 years and also earns income from raising pigs.  Remedios has requested a PHP 5000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, shampoo, beverages, etc.  She has borrowed and repaid 1 loan from NWTF before this loan. 

Remedios aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, shampoo, beverages, etc.

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.en:
Rosalina is 44 years old and married with six children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines.  Rosalina has been raising pigs for 15 years and also earns additional income farming rice. She is borrowing PHP 7000 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Rosalina is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Sumalia

texts.en:
Sumalia  is a 50-year-old  married man with 4 children ages 26, 22, 20 and 15 years, all attend school. He has 2 additional dependents, who live with him to be fostered.  

In 2010, Sumalia established his essential drugs business after his wife graduated from a nursing school.  He saved his salary to open the drug  shop and works 7 days a week, 16 hours a day to earn 1,085,000 SLL every month. 

He would like a loan in the amount of 4,000,000 SLL  to purchase cartons of syrups, ampiclox, chloramphenicol, and blood tonic.  In the future, Sumalia plans to complete his building project, open another outlet, and provide a quality education for his children.  Frequent increases shop rent is a challenge.  
He thanks you for your support

loans.use: to purchase syrup, ampiclox, chloramphenicol, and blood tonic.

loans.name: Musa

texts.en: This is 42-year-old Musa. He is married and has two children aged 14 and 19. In 2011, Musa established his call enter business, selling E-vouchers and charging mobile phones. He began his business to develop himself and improve on his income by making more profit. His business is located at the outskirts of the city. Working 7 days a week and 12 hours a day, he earns about Le 900,000 every month from this business. He would like a loan in the amount of Le 3,000,000 in order to purchase another generator and E-vouchers for resale. He hopes that this loan will support him to better enhance his living standards and increase his profit margin. In the future, Musa plans to build a house and educate his children up to university level. He appreciates Kiva lenders for their kind gesture and prays that they continue to support him. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy another generator and more E-vouchers.

loans.name: Ana Vilma

texts.es: Ana de 49 años de edad vive en casa propia con hijo quien trabaja y le ayuda económicamente, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa de forma ambulante por los diferentes mercados tiene muchos clientes fijos por la calidad de la ropa y los buenos precios, ella está solicitando un crédito para la comprar de mas ropa por mayor para poder continuar con sus ventas y así poder tener mejore ingresos.
texts.en:
Ana is 49 years old and lives in her own house with her son, who works and helps her financially. She earns her living as a street vendor selling clothing in different markets. She has many regular customers because of the quality of the clothes and her good prices. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase more clothing at wholesale so that she can continue with her sales and therefore be able to have a better income.

loans.use: to buy more clothing at wholesale

loans.name: Faailo

texts.en:
Faailo is a 43 years old married woman with 5 children.  

She has a small plantation and grows tomatoes, cabbage, cucumbers, beans, etc. to earn a living.  She has been doing this for 5 years.

Faailo has requested a loan to buy fertilizers, seeds, a wheelbarrow, a rake, a shovel, knives etc. She has been a member of SBPD since November 2014. 

With her profits,Faailo hopes to expand her business and save for unexpected emergencies

loans.use: fertilizers, seeds, a wheelbarrow, a rake, a shovel, knives etc

loans.name: Antonieta

texts.es:
La socia Antonieta continua dedicándose a su negocio de restaurante, la socia continua elaborando diferentes platos como arroz con pollo, saltados, sopas entre otros, la socia  es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de arroz, aceite entre otros.
texts.en: Antonieta is continuing her restaurant business, making different dishes such as chicken with rice, sautés, soups, and other things.  She is a responsible and hardworking person who wants to continue working and supporting her family.  She is asking for a loan to buy rice, cooking oil, and other things.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Ronaldo

texts.en:
Ronaldo is 43 years old from Salangan, San Miguel, Bulacan.  Their family earns their income from selling various items in the public market such as slippers and shoes.  

With an indefinite income, they find it hard to budget, especially for the schooling of their children.  That’s why Ronaldo is requesting an education loan of PHP200,000 from the Kiva's lenders for his daughter, Coleen.  Coleen is studying for a college degree. 

Ronaldo wants to send her to school because he knows that she will improve her social, intellectual and spiritual life.

loans.use: to pay for his daughter's tuition fees

loans.name: Ralph

texts.en:
Ralph is 18 years old, from Cabanatuan City.  Their family’s source of income is through farming, but with 6 siblings, their family’s income is insufficient. 

Despite his young age, he dreams of a better life for his family, and he knows that he can make this possible if he finishes his education.  

His parents can’t afford his schooling that’s why he is requesting an educational loan of PHP15,000 from Kiva's lenders to pay for his school fees.

loans.use: to pay for his tuition fees

loans.name: Christian

texts.en: Christian is from Gen. Natividad, Nueva Ecija. He is taking up a Mechatronics course. He wants to finish this to find a stable job and be able to help his parents out of poverty. But he knows that studying is expensive; that’s why he wants to seek 15,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) of financial assistance from the KIVA lenders to be used in his schooling.

loans.use: to pay for his tuition fee

loans.name: John Carlo

texts.en: John Carlo is a 19-year-old student from Cabanatuan City. He has four siblings, two of whom are younger than him. Being a good brother, he wants to help his parents in sending his siblings to school. He knows that he can do this if he finishes his schooling and finds a stable job. That’s why he wants to avail himself of an education loan of 15,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) from the Kiva lenders, which he will use to help in sustaining his studies, because his parents can't sustain all of their needs.

loans.use: to pay for his tuition fee

loans.name: Ihrene

texts.en: Ihrene is a 19-year-old student from Pangatian, Cabanatuan City. She knows that her parents are struggling financially for there are 7 siblings and their only income is from their sari-sari store. Because of this, she wants to obtain an education loan of PHP 15,000 from the Kiva lenders to lessen her parents’ burden. She will utilize this for her school expenses.

loans.use: to pay for her tuition fee

loans.name: Jennifer

texts.en: Jennifer, from Cabanatuan City, is one of the children of Antonio, whose wife died. With nine children, Antonio finds it hard to support all of them financially. Because of that, Jennifer wants to avail herself of a loan of 15,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) from the Kiva lenders to lessen the burden of her father. She will use the loan to sustain her studies. She wants to finish her schooling to help her father and her siblings.

loans.use: to pay for her tuition fee

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
Alma works hard to support her family. Alma is married and has a food-vending business in the Philippines.

Alma requested a 10,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food-production business.

Alma has been in this business for six years now.

Alma would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food-production business

loans.name: Bernarditha

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Bernarditha works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and earns additional income from a general store. Bernarditha is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF to purchase ingredients like meat, noodles, fish, vegetables, spices, etc. for her food vending business.

Bernarditha has been sustaining her business activities through her past 19 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients like meat, noodles, fish, vegetables, spices, etc. for her food production business

loans.name: Catalina

texts.en:
Catalina is 40 years old and married with four children. Catalina works very hard to provide for them.

Catalina runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items like canned goods, soft-drinks, beer, biscuits, candies, etc. to sell.

Catalina has been in this business for six years and sells a variety of items. 

In the future, Catalina would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional items like canned goods, soft-drinks, beer, biscuits, candies, etc. to sell

loans.name: Cheryl

texts.en:
Cheryl is a married woman with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Cheryl is 32 years old, and two children are currently in school.

Cheryl has a general store business in the Philippines. Cheryl requested a 15,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) loan amount through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell in her general store.

Cheryl has been in this business for six years. In the future, Cheryl would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell in her general store

loans.name: Conchita

texts.en:
Conchita works hard to support her family. Conchita is married and has a general store business in the Philippines.

Conchita requested a 12,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) loan through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell in her general store.

Conchita has been in this business for six years now.

In the future, Conchita would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Rowela

texts.en:
Rowela is 29 years old and has two children who are in school.  She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Rowela has a fishing business in the Philippines.  has been in this business for 7 years.  Rowela requested a PHP 20000 loan amount through NWTF to buy fishing nets and other materials for fishing.

In the future, Rowela would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets and other materials for fishing

loans.name: Héctor Manuel

texts.es: Este emprendedor hombre de 61 años de edad, inició su negocio de venta de meriendas cuando en un colegio unos estudiantes quisieron degustar de sus productos y le encargaron, a partir de ese momento los estudiantes quedaron encantados con las delicias que elabora el señor Héctor, quien ofrece una variada carta de comestibles; jugos naturales, buñuelos, hamburguesas, pastelitos rellenos de pollo, queso o carne de res, pizzas, croissant entre otros. Este negocio empezó a funcionar desde el año 1996 y ha logrado mantenerse, incluso se ha expandido a otros mercados no solamente vende a los colegios sino también a las tiendas de barrio.  Sus ventas son canceladas de contado, así mismo sus compras las realiza de contado a graneros ubicados en el centro de Barranquilla. En la actualidad Héctor está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo mediante el cual invertirá en la compra de una licuadora industria, frutas como manzanas, tomate de árbol, mango, e insumos como harina, queso, vitina y carnes. Héctor es padre de 1 hijo y 2 hijas, su meta familiar es continuar aumentando los ingresos, por eso su se interesa en mejorar sus equipos de trabajo para mejorar la productividad.
texts.en:
This entrepreneur is 61 years old and started his food business when some students wanted to enjoy his products and they requested them from him.  After that the students were happy with the things Hector mades.  He has a large menu of items; natural juices, buñuelos, hamburgers, chicken, cheese, and beef pies, pizzas, croissants, etc.  This business began working in 1996 and has managed to sustain itself and expand into other markets.  He not only sells to schools, but also to neighborhood stores.  His sales are for cash, as are his purchases from suppliers in Barranquilla.

Hector is asking for a Kiva loan, which will be his first loan through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo that he will use to buy an industrial blender, fruit such as apples, tomatoes, mangos, and supplies like flour, cheese, vitina, and meats.  Hector has one son and two daughters.  His goal is to continue increasing his income.  This is why he wants to upgrade his working tools, so he can increase his productivity.

loans.use: to buy supplies and ingredients.

loans.name: Doris

texts.en:
